SEARCH
Package photos24

Class Picture

java.lang.Object
photos24.Picture
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Picture extends Object implements Serializable
Represents a picture in the Photos24 application.
See Also:

  • Method Details

    • getDateLastModified

      public Calendar getDateLastModified()
      Gets the date when the picture was last modified.
      Returns:
      The date of the last modification, or null if the file doesn't exist.

    • getTag

      public Tag getTag(String tagName)
      Retrieves a specific tag from the picture.
      Parameters:
      tagName - The name of the tag.
      Returns:
      The requested tag or null if not found.

    • getTags

      public List<Tag> getTags()
      Retrieves all tags of the picture.
      Returns:
      A list of tags.

    • addTag

      public void addTag(String name, ArrayList<String> tagValues, boolean multiple)
      Adds a tag to the picture.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the tag.
      tagValues - The values for the tag.
      multiple - Indicates if multiple values are allowed for the tag.

    • updateTag

      public void updateTag(Tag tag, ArrayList<String> newValues)
      Updates the values of an existing tag.
      Parameters:
      tag - The tag to be updated.
      newValues - The new values for the tag.

    • removeTag

      public void removeTag(Tag tagToRemove)
      Removes a tag from the picture.
      Parameters:
      tagToRemove - The tag to be removed.

    • hasTag

      public boolean hasTag(Tag tagToCheck)
      Checks if the picture has a specific tag.
      Parameters:
      tagToCheck - The tag to check.
      Returns:
      True if the tag is present, false otherwise.

      public String getName()
      Retrieves the name of the picture.
      Returns:

      Parameters:

      Parameters:
